verses.text: \w Understanding|strong="H3824"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*. \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, why hast thou cast \w us|strong="H3478"\w* off unto \w the|strong="H0389"\w* end: why \w is|strong="H0430"\w* thy wrath enkindled \w against|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H0389"\w* sheep \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy pasture?

Remember thy congregation, which thou hast possessed \w from|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* beginning. \w The|strong="H0589"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H0369"\w* thy inheritance which thou hast redeemed: mount Sion \w in|strong="H4592"\w* which thou hast dwelt.

Lift \w up|strong="H7200"\w* thy hands against \w their|strong="H3588"\w* pride unto \w the|strong="H3588"\w* end; \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* things \w the|strong="H3588"\w* enemy hath done wickedly \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sanctuary.

\w And|strong="H1277"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hate thee \w have|strong="H0369"\w* made \w their|strong="H3588"\w* boasts, \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4194"\w* thy solemnity. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* set up \w their|strong="H3588"\w* ensigns \w for|strong="H3588"\w* signs,

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* knew \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w both|strong="H0120"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* going out \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w on|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* highest top. \w As|strong="H5060"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* axes \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* wood \w of|strong="H0369"\w* trees,

\w They|strong="H3651"\w* have cut down \w at|strong="H3651"\w* once \w the|strong="H3651"\w* gates thereof, \w with|strong="H3651"\w* axe \w and|strong="H2555"\w* hatchet \w they|strong="H3651"\w* have brought \w it|strong="H3651"\w* down.

\w They|strong="H3824"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3318"\w* thy sanctuary: \w they|strong="H3824"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* defiled \w the|strong="H3318"\w* dwelling place \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy name \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H7451"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H7451"\w* heart, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* whole kindred \w of|strong="H1696"\w* them together: Let \w us|strong="H7451"\w* abolish all \w the|strong="H1696"\w* festival days \w of|strong="H1696"\w* God \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* land.

\w Our|strong="H0776"\w* signs \w we|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* seen, there \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w now|strong="H1980"\w* no prophet: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* know \w us|strong="H1980"\w* no more.

\w How|strong="H3651"\w* long, O God, \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* enemy reproach: \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* adversary \w to|strong="H7725"\w* provoke thy name \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H0349"\w* dost thou turn away thy hand: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* thy right hand \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0410"\w* thy bosom \w for|strong="H3045"\w* ever?

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* God \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w our|strong="H0428"\w* king before \w ages|strong="H5769"\w*: \w he|strong="H2009"\w* hath wrought salvation \w in|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* midst \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* earth.

Thou by thy strength didst \w make|strong="H2135"\w* \w the|strong="H0389"\w* sea firm: thou didst crush \w the|strong="H0389"\w* heads \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H0389"\w* dragons \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0389"\w* waters.

Thou hast broken \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heads \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dragon: thou hast given \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* meat \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ethiopians.

Thou hast broken \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fountains \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* torrents: thou hast dried \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Ethan rivers.

Thine \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* day, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thine \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* night: thou hast \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning light \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* sun.

Thou hast made \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* borders \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* earth: \w the|strong="H0413"\w* summer \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w spring|strong="H0935"\w* were formed \w by|strong="H0413"\w* thee.
Remember this, \w the|strong="H0389"\w* enemy hath reproached \w the|strong="H0389"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w a|strong="H7896"\w* foolish people hath provoked thy name.

Deliver \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* beasts \w the|strong="H4480"\w* souls \w that|strong="H4480"\w* confess \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H1961"\w* forget \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w end|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* souls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thy poor.

Have regard \w to|strong="H2472"\w* thy covenant: for \w they|strong="H6754"\w* \w that|strong="H0136"\w* \w are|strong="H2472"\w* \w the|strong="H5782"\w* obscure \w of|strong="H0136"\w* \w the|strong="H5782"\w* earth have been filled with dwellings \w of|strong="H0136"\w* iniquity.

Let \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* humble \w be|strong="H3588"\w* turned away \w with|strong="H3588"\w* confusion: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* poor \w and|strong="H3824"\w* needy \w shall|strong="H3824"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* thy name.

Arise, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, judge thy \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w*: remember thy reproaches \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w which|strong="H0929"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* foolish man hath reproached thee \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* day.

Forget not \w the|strong="H0589"\w* voices \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy enemies: \w the|strong="H0589"\w* pride \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* hate thee ascendeth \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.
